title: Slave trade Europe vs from Americas graph Q1

content.question: The predominance of voyages originating in Europe in the period before circa 1800 best represents which of the following?

choices.label: The triangular trade pattern of the Atlantic system
North Atlantic crossings to find a direct route to Asia
The widespread use of the labor of enslaved Africans in agriculture in Europe
Dutch and English improvements on Portuguese and Spanish innovations in ship designs

content.answer: The triangular trade pattern of the Atlantic system

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
